contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's discuss your project and create something amazing together
contact.form_description: Send what you want to print and we will make a 3D model and a sculpture for you.
contact.send_message_description: Do you have a project in mind or just want to say hi? Feel free to send me a message.

anime_figures.title: Anime Figures
anime_figures.description: High-quality figures from popular anime series.

and_more.title: And more...
and_more.description: We can create any 3D model you can imagine.

category_detail.conception_description: We work with you to bring your idea to life, starting with sketches and concepts.
category_detail.modeling_description: Our artists create a detailed 3D model, which we refine based on your feedback.
category_detail.production_description: The final model is 3D printed with high-quality materials and hand-painted.
category_detail.materials_quality_p1: We use only the best materials to ensure your custom figure is durable and looks amazing. Our high-resolution 3D printers capture every detail, and our artists use premium paints for a vibrant, lasting finish.
category_detail.materials_quality_p2: Each piece undergoes a rigorous quality check to guarantee it meets our high standards and your expectations.
category_detail.ready_to_create_description: Let's start the journey of creating your unique custom figure. Contact us for a personalized quote and let's discuss your project.

hero.subtitle: Designing and creating custom Funko Pop figures with precision 3D modeling and printing.

process.section_subtitle: My structured approach to creating exceptional industrial designs
process.step1_title: You Imagine It, We Print It
process.step1_description: Have a character, product idea, or collectible in mind? We design fully custom 3D models from scratch.
process.step2_description: You send us your design, and we will make a 3D model and print it for you.
process.step3_description: You'll work directly with a designer - share your ideas, give feedback, and watch your concept evolve in 3D.
process.step4_description: We use professional-grade printers and materials for clean details, strong structure, and smooth finishes - with turnaround times you can count on.
process.step5_description: Get a free quote up front - pricing based on design complexity, size, and material. We offer great value for one-of-a-kind pieces.
process.method1_description: Advanced custom 3d modeling techniques that inform design decisions and drive innovation.
process.method2_description: Advanced high-precision 3d printing techniques that inform design decisions and drive innovation.
process.method3_description: Advanced client collaboration & revisions techniques that inform design decisions and drive innovation.
process.method4_description: Advanced material selection & finishing techniques that inform design decisions and drive innovation.

about.section_subtitle: Specializing in custom Funko Pop design and high-quality 3D modeling
about.bio_title: Funko Artist & 3D Modeler with a passion for pop culture
about.bio_p1: With years of experience in 3D modeling and character design, I specialize in creating custom Funko Pop figures that capture unique personalities and pop culture icons.
about.bio_p2: My design process focuses on three key elements: capturing character essence, maintaining Funko's signature style, and ensuring print-ready quality. Each custom figure starts with concept art and ends with a polished 3D model.
about.bio_p3: Having created figures for collectors, celebrities, and brands, I bring meticulous attention to detail to every project, ensuring each Funko Pop is both instantly recognizable and uniquely personal.
about.skill1_description: Capturing unique personalities and pop culture icons in the distinctive Funko Pop style.
about.skill2_description: Digital sculpting with attention to Funko's signature proportions and stylized features.
about.skill3_description: Applying textures and colors that match Funko's distinctive vinyl figure aesthetic.
about.skill4_description: Preparing models for high-quality 3D printing with optimal supports and orientation.
